pullrequest.title: Possibility to enforce contact addition in ContactManager even if there are no subscribers

content.raw:
Thanks for the review. I've made the edits accordingly.

Adding a test is a good idea, I will add one very soon. 

Quick question, would it make sense to add the changes in the additions of [contact_manager_enforcable_additions](https://bitbucket.org/JenniferBuehler/gazebo/src/0098d8d9839fb5bc856a5dfe3d01efcd64564f74/gazebo/?at=contact_manager_enforcable_additions) as well? In this case I'll make a test which uses the new SubscribersConnected() function as well.
content.html:
Thanks for the review. I've made the edits accordingly.

Adding a test is a good idea, I will add one very soon.

Quick question, would it make sense to add the changes in the additions of contact_manager_enforcable_additions as well? In this case I'll make a test which uses the new SubscribersConnected() function as well.
